name: Spook (Run Dot Games)
description:
So... you're dead, now what?  Life doesn't end at the last breath.  For those of us unlucky enough to be stuck on this mortal plane, there's definitely some fun to be had! Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • X -  Take Actions (haunt and block doors)
Game Play
  • Find haunts to scare investigators in nearby rooms
    • Haunts attract investigators matching the haunt symbol in green
    • Haunts scare away investigators matching the haunt symbol in red
    • Haunts are scariest to those inside the current room.
  • Block doors to prevent investigators from getting out of  the house.
Goal
  • Make it to night's end. Each action progresses the night to its end (tracked by the purple zone at the top of the screen)
  • Scare everyone to reach fear levels in the green/yellow zone indicated at the top of the screen to win
  • Avoid Panic. Scare one investigator too much and they will run for the front door. If they make it out, the night's fun is over and you loose.
